text: Ana ngankuiona yanti Allah jukuimanya yaili kumawunde ni yaili petaka? Ngaukasatamidwaga ntemela wa wandu watatu ikaweje Jwalakwe jukasawa Jwancheche jwao, naatamuno wa wandu nsano ikaweje Jwalakwe jukasawa Jwansano najumo jwao, naatamuno wa wandu wakunandipila pele kapena wakutupila ikawejepe Jwalakwe jukasawa nao palipose pachawe (ni umanyilisi Wakwe wangasisika chilichose), kaneka ichindu yawapanginyisye tachatagulila lisiku lya Kiyama, chisimu Allah chindu chilichose awele Jwaachimanya chenene
